channel.title: Someone help me with owner commands plzzzzzzzzz

item.title: Someone help me with owner commands plzzzzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

i think you want something like:

replace:

(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mervboyj") && playerRights >= 3)

and change it to:

(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mervboyj") && !playerName = mervboyj3)

if that doesnt work remove the “!” before playerName

you will have to change it for each person… like…

(command.equalsIgnoreCase("icy fresh00") && !playerName = icy fresh00)

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me with owner commands plzzzzzzzzz

item.title: Someone help me with owner commands plzzzzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

i am the 0wner of my server and i have 2 co-owners (icy fresh00 and meller mager) and i have my own commands set for only me to use for some odd reason but i want them to be able to work for icy and meller to, look at code and help me plz

                                              else if

(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mervboyj”) &&

playerRights >= 3) {

                     ClearQuestInterface();

sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj’s Personal

Commands", 8170);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if

it is currently off", 8171);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off

if it is currently on", 8172);

sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently

mutes a player, doesn’t run out", 8173);

sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a

perm or temp muted player", 8174);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me

unable to be attacked by players", 8175);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me

attackable again by other players", 8176);

sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some

decent Pk gear to kill people", 8177);

sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a

player into a Moderator instantly", 8178);

sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a

player into an Admin instantly", 8179);

sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin

or Mod back into a normal player", 8180);

sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this

command to trigger an update if needed", 8181);

sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command

will kick ALL players on the server", 8182);

sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin

who can’t use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a

player to make them unattackable by others",

8184);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player

to make them attackable by players", 8185);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make

all of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my

stats go back to their regular levels", 8187);

sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible

in the main game window to players", 8188);

sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make

me visible again if I am invisible", 8189);

sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the

right click option change to IP ban", 8190);

Read full topic
